segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how focused they are on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of the water spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing in that puddle, drying dishes like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s always this out of touch with her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don’t fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just one big accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
